nodes.text: Bestine IV, also known simply as Bestine, was a planet located in the galaxy's Inner Rim on the Corellian Trade Spine that held the fourth orbital position in the Bestine system. The Shahkirin mechanic Yipsit grew up on the cliffs of Bestine IV before joining the Resistance.

In the last years of the Galactic Republic, shipments of lommite from the planet Eriadu had to circle around Bestine to reach the Core Worlds. In attempting to recruit Eriadu's Governor Wilhuff Tarkin, Separatist Head of State Count Dooku revealed his understanding of the significance of the shipping route by warning that the route would soon be sabotaged by critical planets' secession from the Republic. However, Bestine would remain with the Republic during the ensuing Clone Wars and the Republic Navy would base a fleet there as part of the conflict.
In 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance's Twenty-First was present on Bestine as a part of a coordinated effort to distract forces and allow the Alliance fleet to complete its withdrawal from the Mid Rim.

In the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, a blue-and-white cosmetic skin named "Bestine" can be unlocked and applied to the in-game droid companion, BD-1. Located in the Ice Caves of Zeffo, the collectible is guarded by a Purge Trooper and a scout trooper commander.
